description.en: No space is left on disk

description.cn: 引擎调度单元状态错误
存储单元中无可用空间

description.en: More than one fields are array type
description.cn: 超过一个索引字段包含数组

description.en: No space can be found for index extent
Two records get same key and rid
description.cn: 两条记录拥有同样的键值和RID

description.en: Hit the max of dedup buffer
No more temp collections are avaliable
Exceed max number of storage unit
Log was not found in log buf
Log was not found in log file

description.cn: 系统引擎调度单元不可被终止

description.en: Unable to listen the specified address
Unable to connect to the specified address
Reorg file is in read only mode
Collection is not in reorg state
Node does not belong to the group
Version is expired for local group
Version is expired for remote group
Updated information is same as old one
Not enough number of data nodes
Catalog information does not exist on data node
description.cn: 数据节点不存在编目信息

description.en: Catalog version is expired on data node
description.cn: 数据节点编目版本过旧

description.en: Catalog version is expired on coordinator node
description.cn: 协调节点编目版本过旧
数据文件空间管理段错误

description.en: Failed to query on coord node
EOC message is received by coordinator node
description.cn: 协调节点接收到集合结尾消息

description.en: Size of DPS files are not the same
Pipe buffer size is too small
description.cn: 命名管道请求发送的数据过大

description.en: Failed to assign data node from coordinator node
description.cn: 协调节点分配数据节点失败

description.en: No activated group information on catalog
description.cn: 不存在已激活节点组的信息

description.en: Unable to find the matched catalog information
description.cn: 无法找到匹配的编目信息

description.en: Group information cannot be found on coordinator node
description.cn: 协调节点无法找到本地节点组信息

description.en: Remote database services have been stopped
description.cn: 远程引擎已部分被停止

description.en: DMS state is not compatible with current command
description.cn: DMS状态与当前请求不兼容

description.en: Cache is empty on coordinator node
description.cn: 协调节点的缓存中无数据

description.en: The operation is for coord node only
description.cn: 该操作仅适用于协调节点
在节点上执行操作失败

description.en: The specified job does not exist
The command can't be run in the node
description.cn: 该节点不能运行该命令

description.en: The command can't be run in the service plane
description.cn: 该服务平面不能运行该命令

description.en: The record does not contains valid sharding key
description.cn: 记录不包含合法的分区键

description.en: A task that already exists does not compatible with the new task
description.cn: 存在一个不兼容的任务

description.en: The collection does not exists on the specified group
description.cn: 集合在指定复制组中不存在

description.en: The specified task does not exist
The record contains more than one sharding key
description.cn: 记录包含超过一条分区键

description.en: The split key is not valid or not in the source group
description.cn: 指定的分区键不合法或不在源节点范围内

description.en: The unique index must include all fields in sharding key
description.cn: 唯一索引必须包含分区键中的所有字段

description.en: There is no catalog address specified by user
No records can be matched for the search condition
description.cn: 搜索条件无法满足任何条件的匹配

description.en: Index page is reorged and the pos got different lchild
description.cn: 索引页重组后指定位置存在不同左子节点

description.en: Duplicate field name exists in the record
description.cn: 记录内含有重复字段名

description.en: Too many records to be inserted at once
description.cn: 插入操作尝试写入过多数据

description.en: Sort-Merge Join only supports equal predicates
description.cn: 合并连接只接受相等谓词
系统正在执行回滚操作

description.en: Invalid record is found during import
description.cn: 导入数据库时遇到无效的记录
索引被删除或非法状态

description.en: Unable to create new catalog when there's already one exists
description.cn: 重复创建编目节点集群

description.en: Log file size is too large
Unable to remove the last node or primary in a group
description.cn: 不能删除组内唯一的节点或者主节点

description.en: Unable to clean up catalog, manual cleanup may be required
description.cn: 需要手工完成清理工作

description.en: Unable to remove primary catalog or catalog group for non-empty database
description.cn: 系统存在其它组时不能删除主编目节点和编目节点组

description.en: Unable to split because of no sharding index exists
description.cn: 集合不存在分区键索引,不能按百分比分区

description.en: The parameter field does not exist
Too many break points are specified
split percentage is lower then expected
RouteID is different from the local
Exporting configuration does not complete in all nodes
description.cn: 部分节点导出配置文件失败

description.en: Secret value for index file does not match with data file
description.cn: 索引文件特征值与数据文件不匹配

description.en: New boundary is conflict with the existing boundary
description.cn: 新增区间与现有区间冲突

description.en: Sharding type must be ranged partition for partitioned-collection
description.cn: 分区集合的分区类型必须是范围分区

description.en: There is no valid sharding-key defined
description.cn: 未包含合法的分区键字段

description.en: Operation is not supported on partitioned-collection
description.cn: 分区集合不支持此操作

description.en: Dropping the collection space is in progress
Hit the limit of maximum number of nodes in the cluster
The node is not in normal status
description.cn: 节点处于业务故障状态

description.en: Failed to wait for the sync operation from secondary nodes
description.cn: 等待备节点同步该操作失败

description.en: Data source is running out of connection pool

description.cn: 文件描述符已达到上限

description.en: The data received by REST is larger than the max size
description.cn: REST接收的数据大小超过最大值

description.en: Stored procedure arguments are out of bound
Failed to execute command on data node
description.cn: 在数据节点上执行命令失败
域中不包含任何数据组
提示用户修改登陆密码

description.en: One or more nodes did not complete successfully
There is another OM Agent running with different version

description.cn: 无法找到后台任务信息
大对象处于不可用状态

description.en: Data is not in UTF-8 format
There are some collections in the collection space
description.cn: 集合空间中存在有效集合

description.en: 'localhost' and '127.0.0.1' cannot be used mixed with other hostname and IP address
description.cn: 'localhost'和'127.0.0.1'不能与其它hostname和IP地址混合使用

description.en: If use 'localhost' and '127.0.0.1' for hostname, coord and catalog must in the same host
description.cn: 如果使用'localhost'和'127.0.0.1'作为节点主机名，协调节点与编目节点必须在同一主机上

description.en: The special group is not data group
description.cn: 指定分区组不是数据分区组

description.en: can not update/delete records when $id index does not exist
description.cn: 当集合没有$id索引时，无法update/delete记录

description.en: can not step up when primary node exists or LSN is not the biggest
description.cn: 当存在主节点或者本地LSN不为最大值时无法强行升主

description.en: Image address is conflict with the self cluster
description.cn: 镜像地址和本集群地址冲突

description.en: The data group does not have image group
The data group has image group
The image is in enabled status
The cluster's image does not configured
This cluster and image cluster is both writable
description.cn: 本集群和镜像集群都为可写状态

description.en: Sorting of 'query and modify' must use index
description.cn: 在’查询并修改‘操作使用排序时必须使用索引

description.en: 'query and modify' can't use skip and limit in multiple nodes or sub-collections
description.cn: ’查询并修改‘操作不能在多个节点或子表上执行skip和limit操作

description.en: Exist one index which can cover this scene
description.cn: 已经存在一个可以处理本场景的索引

description.en: The cluster's image has already configured
The command is in local mode
The object is not a special object in sdb shell
description.cn: 不是一个特殊类型的Sdb Shell对象
大对象的序列已经存在

description.en: user specified is not exist or password is invalid
description.cn: 用户不存在或密码错误
压缩算法执行压缩失败
压缩算法执行解压缩失败

description.en: Buffer for compression is too small
Buffer for decompression is too small
data source is not enabled yet
the record which exclusive ruleID is not exist
Data source has not been initialized
Operation is incompatible with the object
description.cn: 操作类型与操作对象不兼容

description.en: Some configuration changes didn't take effect
